# PostgreSQL Requirements for Terraform Enterprise

-> **Note:** These requirements apply to the External Services operational mode, not the Mounted Disk operational mode. Refer to [Operation Modes](/terraform/enterprise/flexible-deployments/install/operation-modes) for more information.
